Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Kendry Esparza (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2015, off Benjamin Berg (PHI)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2015, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2015, hitting .435 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2016, hitting .550 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2016, hitting .361 with 4 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2016, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/9/2017 to a 4-year deal worth $17,000,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2017...
Injured on 5/30/2018 with a Torn Hamstring Muscle, out for full season...
